Sri Lanka - Third Development Finance
            Corporation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Development Finance
            Corporation Project will meet DFCC's estimated foreign
            exchange requirements over the next two years for lending
            mainly to export-oriented industries and tourism.
